_comment: WOPR WhatsApp Plugin - Personal Phone Configuration
_description: Safe configuration for using your personal WhatsApp number as a private AI assistant. Prevents accidental spam to friends and family.

whatsapp._comment2: DM Policy - only respond to allowed numbers
whatsapp._comment3: Allowlist - only these numbers can DM the bot
whatsapp._comment4: IMPORTANT: Replace +1234567890 with your actual phone number in E.164 format
whatsapp._comment5: E.164 format: +[country code][number] without spaces or dashes
whatsapp._comment7: Self-Chat Mode - CRITICAL for personal numbers
whatsapp._comment8: When enabled, bot only responds to ownerNumber, preventing accidental replies to contacts
whatsapp._comment9: Owner Number - your phone number (required for self-chat mode)
whatsapp._comment10: IMPORTANT: Replace with your actual phone number
whatsapp._comment11: Verbose logging - disable for normal use, enable for debugging
whatsapp._comment15: Optional: Block specific numbers (only used with dmPolicy: blocklist)
